column5: River Time properties is located on the beautiful Guadalupe River near Hunt, TX. There are 6 bedrooms, 4 1/2 baths in three houses on this beautiful secluded river property. Enjoy the beautiful views of the river, listen to the birds, watch the deer and cool off in the blue green waters of the Guadalupe.   River Time is a great place to unwind, take a step back in time and relax enjoy and this beautiful secluded river property!
